org.apache.edgent.topology.spi

Class AbstractTopology<X extends Tester>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.edgent.topology.spi.AbstractTopology<X>
  • Type Parameters:
    X - Tester type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Topology, TopologyElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GraphTopology

    public abstract class AbstractTopology<X extends Tester>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Topology
    Topology implementation that uses the basic functions to implement most sources streams.

      • generate

        public <T> TStream<T> generate(Supplier<T> data)
        Description copied from interface: Topology
        Declare an endless source stream. data.get() will be called repeatably. Each non-null returned value will be present on the stream.

        If data implements AutoCloseable, its close() method will be called when the topology's execution is terminated.

        Specified by:
        generate in interface Topology
        Type Parameters:
        T - Tuple type
        Parameters:
        data - Supplier of the tuples.
        Returns:
        New stream containing the tuples from calls to data.get() .
        See Also:
        Edgent Source Streams

      • collection

        public <T> TStream<T> collection(java.util.Collection<T> tuples)
        Description copied from interface: Topology
        Declare a stream of constants from a collection. The returned stream will contain all the tuples in tuples.
        Specified by:
        collection in interface Topology
        Type Parameters:
        T - Tuple type
        Parameters:
        tuples - Tuples that will be present on the stream.
        Returns:
        Stream containing all values in tuples.
